infos.value: Nngh... So this is Rundall's «Crucium».
R-retreat!
We did it, Lu'Cia! The Sanctum Monks are running away!
Let's follow after them!
Do no such thing.
Huh...?
Now's our chance for glory!
No mercy for Crystal believer scum!
Stop!
This is no time for a relentless pursuit!
Let us follow suit. Now is the opportune time to eradicate the enemy.
You think Sadali's henchmen are that foolish?
Huh...?
You two stuck around.
If that dissatisfies you, then give us your command to charge on.
One needs more than courage in a fight.
...I cannot let my soldiers march off to their own slaughter.
...Commander!
Tell me. What lies up ahead?
I won't let you off with saying they simply ran away.
May the light of the Crystals guide me.
Ungh!
If you're going to plead for your life, worry not. I have mastered the art of avoiding vital organs.
Your suffering shall be ample.
...Go ahead. My blood and pain will be proof of my loyalty to Lord Sadali.
...Hmph. That's enough, Lu'Cia.
My apologies. I overstepped my bounds...
Are you prepared to follow through?
If it's my resolve you're questioning, no need. As long as it is in service of Lord Jayden...
Be that as it may, this one's lips appear to be sealed. Right now, time is of the essence.
Shall we follow after those Sanctum Monks, then?
I can't just abandon my soldiers, after all.
We will provide covering fire.
All right... Please do.
Keep this one alive. We'll take him back to the castle.
Yes, sir!
